professional.name: Abintus Consulting
professional.description: Built and managed a site that offers automated versions of some services we offer. Built and maintained a comprehensive intranet that displays data and analytics and processes large inputs of data, among many other things. Built Windows Forms applications in Visual Studio with C# to process large amounts of data in Excel spreadsheets. Managed our brochure site in Hubspot in addition to doing design and branding.

professional.name: Flugelhorn Web Agency
professional.description: Built and maintained shop sites for several clients, working with Next.js and firebase.

freelance.name: Corcordium
freelance.description: Fashion journal and portfolio site for Leelou Reboh. Built using Next.js and React, with all content being stored and managed in Contentful.

freelance.name: 1er
freelance.description: A site designed to help UK homeowners skip the red tape and bureaucracy of building additions to their houses. Built in Ruby on Rails, this site walks the user through the entire process of premier planning, all the way to the blueprint stage.

freelance.name: Millie Penner
freelance.description: A quirky and fun shop and portfolio site for Millie Penner, reminiscent of the internet of the early 2000s.
